scripts.audit:performance: npm run build && npm start & sleep 3 && npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --output=json --output-path=tests/performance/reports/lighthouse-$(date +%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S).json && pkill -f "npm start" || pkill -f "next start" || true
scripts.audit:mobile: npm run build && npm start & sleep 3 && npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --output=json --output-path=tests/performance/reports/lighthouse-mobile-$(date +%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S).json --form-factor=mobile --throttling-method=simulate && pkill -f "npm start" || pkill -f "next start" || true
